item.title: EP 624 - Take A Ride In The Haunted Cab Of Death!
item.itunes:title: Take A Ride In The Haunted Cab Of Death!
item.description:
Today I save your live, help you steal corn, and then we take a haunted cab ride!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Links:

EP 218 - Is Freddy Kruger Based On A Real Demon?

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-218-is-freddy-kruger-based-on-a-real-demon

EP 188 - Is The Smithsonian Destroying Giant Skeletons?

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-188-is-the-smithsonian-destroying-giant-skeletons

Ask Us: Why is it dangerous to heat water in the microwave?

https://scienceillustrated.com.au/blog/science/ask-us-why-is-it-dangerous-to-heat-water-in-the-microwave/#:~:text=There%20have%20been%20reports%20of,of%20steam%20or%20air%20present.

Superheating and microwave ovens

https://www.animations.physics.unsw.edu.au/jw/superheating.htm

'Cursed' Corn Sticks to Man's Head

https://www.coasttocoastam.com/article/cursed-corn-sticks-to-man-s-head/

Thief forced to surrender to police after sack of maize he stole stuck on his back

https://www.tuko.co.ke/272842-thief-forced-surrender-police-sack-maize-stole-stuck-back.html#272842

2) 1897: The haunted London taxi

https://blog.britishnewspaperarchive.co.uk/2014/10/27/11-unusual-tales-of-terror-from-historical-newspapers/

 

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
